function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low percentage of population viewing climate change as caused by human activities","Impact":"Inadequate support for climate change initiatives and policies","Mitigation":"Increase public awareness and education on the impact of human activities on climate change","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, social media outreach, and documentary films","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, and environmental advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Reliance on reducing non-essential economic activities for tackling COVID-19 and climate change","Impact":"Economic instability and resistance to behavior change","Mitigation":"Invest in sustainable economic alternatives and provide financial support for essential workers","Technologies":"Remote work technology, sustainable energy solutions, and financial aid programs","People":"General population, essential workers","Owner":"Government, private sector, and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Social-psychological factors influencing HEMS technology adoption intention and WTP during COVID-19","Impact":"Inadequate uptake of HEMS technology and limited willingness to pay for its features","Mitigation":"Promote the benefits of HEMS for health, safety, and energy efficiency through targeted communication and incentives","Technologies":"Behavioral psychology frameworks, targeted advertising, and incentive programs","People":"Consumers, households","Owner":"Technology companies, marketing agencies, and public health organizations"}]}
